Missing.css Version 1.0.4

Â§ Changelog

  • Action required: Changed how sidenotes are made. Instead of a <small> inside a <span>, use a <small> with role="note".

  • Added .primary-font, .secondary-font, .display-font and .mono-font utilities.

    • Action required: .mono-font deprecates .monospace, which will be removed in a future release.

  • Added .massivetext utility.

  • Added .<small> and .<a> masquerade classes

  • Fixed a visual bug in pressed buttons

  • Made borders less prominent in tables
